Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: Evaluationslink https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=AUYQ7 Hallo Ihr, anbei der Link mit der Bitte uns zu evaluieren. Wir sind heute nur nicht grottenschlecht, weil sich Eure Vorgänger erbarmt haben uns Feedback zu geben, also bitte im Namen Eurer Nachfolger, helft uns noch besser zur werden.

Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: This is a reminder that this Thursday there will be the T cell development lecture by Mischo.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Sorry, this was too spontaneous - no lecture today

Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: Dear all,  9 people is not enough and there are some who would like to attend the lecture but can't make it spontaneously. We will find another date. I will coordinate with Mischo and Mar to book a room on the 5.6.24 at 18:00. As soon as everything is secure from their side, we will do another survey for that date and if we get enough participants, we will do the lecture then. Sorry for the back and forth, Geraldine

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Please partipate in survey, only 9 attendents so far

Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: Dear All, 9 people are too few to do the lecture today. I could try to convince Mischo to do it on Wednesday 5th, hoping that would be better planable for you in advance. In that week we have no lecture on the 6.6. (Thursday). Please also vote no, in case you cant make it today and would prefer the 5.6. Geraldine

Messages.Author: Mar Reines
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Due to the short notice for today's lecture, please complete the survey published on the main ISIS page to indicate whether or not you plan to attend. Thank you! Mar

Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: Sorry for the short notice, it is totally worth going.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: WEDNESDAY - T cell development with Mischo

Messages.Author: Geraldine Nouailles-Kursar
Messages.Content: Wednesday 22.5.24, 18:00 - 19:30 T cell development in Hörsaal C (same as the Thursday lectures).

Messages.Author: Mar Reines
Messages.Content: Dear students, Today the lecture will be canceled because Geraldine is sick.  Sorry for the inconvenience! Best, Mar
